title: Audit 7/20: Debate and consensus
description: Auditor 7: Read previous 6 audit(s), debate conclusions, update consensus tracker for all 45 types.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Read ALL previous audit essays: AUDIT-001 + AUDIT-002 + AUDIT-003 + AUDIT-004 + AUDIT-005 + AUDIT-006
For EACH of the 45 sample types: agree or disagree with previous consensus
If disagreeing, provide counter-arguments with evidence from research papers
Update consensus tracker: docs.local/audit/consensus-tracker.md with current vote counts
